events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision on April 30th involving their car and another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim has been classified under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report describing the car collision.
An insurance agent specialized in vehicle accidents has been assigned to handle the claim for the policyholder.
The customer has received confirmation that the claim for their auto accident has been officially acknowledged.
The customer was requested to submit the police report, photos of vehicle damage, and the accident statement.
All required documents including police report and damage photos have been submitted by the customer.
A detailed investigation into the cause and damages of the car collision has commenced by the claims department.
The investigation has been concluded, determining fault and assessing the full extent of vehicle damage.
A settlement offer based on damage estimates and liability findings has been sent to the customer for approval.
The customer has reviewed the proposed settlement and provided their feedback and acceptance conditions.
The claim has been officially approved for payment following the customer's acceptance of the settlement.
Payment for the approved auto accident claim has been processed and transferred to the customerâ€™s account.
The auto accident claim case has been closed successfully after full settlement and payment completion.
All records related to the vehicle collision claim are now archived for future reference and regulatory compliance.
